author: Alex Seitz-Wald
title: Environmental group bets $14 million on moving swing voters against Trump
description: The League of Conservation Voters is preparing to inundate a relatively narrow band of 1.5 million swing voters on environmental issues to peel support away from President Trump.
content: The League of Conservation Voters, a deep-pocketed environmental group, is preparing a $14 million ad campaign against President Donald Trump, targeting a relatively narrow band of swing voters that the league believes can be moved by environmental messages, … [+25729 chars]
